page.title: 17MY SCHOOL AT BOUGHTON
page.content: Our school is Boughton-under-Blean Methodist Primary.It is a small red brick building erected in 1905.There were originally 4 classrooms around the main hall.The age range was from 5 to 14. It has since been altered and extended to include 2 purpose built infant classrooms,kitchen and library area.There are also on site 2 hutted junior classroooms,1 mobile for music and T.V.,plus outdoor toilet block and air-raid shelter now used as a store. At present there are 147 children whose ages are 5 to 11. We have many activities such as work, sports,fetes and fun.Work consists of English,maths.,projects,music and P.E..At playtimes we play football, netball,climb on the apparatus and make up our own games.(Ref.p.11 & 12). Most of the time we like school.
